page.title: 16OLD FOLK'S HOME,HUMBIE.
page.content: IN OUR SQUARE THERE IS A BIG HOUSE CALLED HAZYHILL.THIS USED TO BE THE MANSE FOR THE FREE CHURCH BUT WHEN THAT WAS DEMOLISHED THE HOUSE WAS SOLD. IT WAS LIVED IN AS A HOUSE FOR A WHILE. THEN EARLIER THIS YEAR SOME PEOPLE BOUGHT IT PLANNING TO TURN IT INTO AN OLD PEOPLES HOME.THEY WERE GOING TO HAVE PUTTING AND ORGANISE OUTINGS FOR THE RESIDENTS.UNFORTUNATELY THIS WAS NOT SUCCESSFUL AS THERE WERE NO ELDERLY PEOPLE WANTING TO LIVE THERE.THIS MIGHT BE BECAUSE THERE ARE STEEP HILLS,ONLY ONE SHOP AND NO OTHER FACILITIES FOR OLD PEOPLE.NOW IT IS UP FOR SALE AGAIN.
